attributes.description:
2019 BMW M850i xDrive:
-BMW LaserLight technology with LED adaptive headlights
-M Carbon exterior roof with interior alacantra lining
-Soft-closing doors
-Keyless access + start
-M technology package
-Surround 3D 360 degrees camera views with parking aid system
-Hands-free open/close of tailgate activated by sensor 
-Red M Sports multifunctional memory front seats
-M seatbelts
-Premium Merino individual leather upholstery
-Touchscreen dashboard with centre controls
-Apple CarPlay + Android Auto smartphone connectivity
-Crystal volume controller, gear and advanced BMW iDrive knob
-Adjustable to preference head-up display 
-Sensor control for volume, climate control, call answering, etc. via hand movements
-Voice control
-Climate comfort windscreen
-Sun protection glazing
-M leather steering wheel
-M Performance illuminated door sills
-Variable-color ambient lighting
-Lighting pulse on door for warning of open door or incoming phone call
-16 speaker Harman Kardon system
-BMW digital key through BMW connected smartphone app used for the locking/unlocking of vehicle and start of vehicle engine.
-Wireless smartphone charging tray/pad
-Tyre pressure monitor
-High beam assist
-Collision warning
-Active steering
-Comfort access
-Cooling/heating front seats (can be optionally controlled by sensor motion)
All vehicles are sold with AA DEKRA – COR & 101 Point Check. Trade-Ins welcome.
Call Us On: 031-3321232/5 Or 0826990569.
Fax 086 633 0053.
Open On Weekdays: 07:30AM - 17:00PM
Saturdays: 08:30AM - 14:00PM. E&OE
- TAG SELECT

Very High Spec - Navigation, TV, Headlamp Wash, Front And Rear Park Distance Control, Telephone, Heated / Electric Front Seats With Memory, High Output Sound System, Electric Rear Roller Blind. The E39 M5 Is Already A Collectors Item And A Good One Like This One Is Becoming Hard To Find.
